featured.text: Male howler monkeys use their loud voices to fight for food, mates, or territory.

definition.zh_def: 指生物學上屬於男性的個體，通常具有生殖器官和特徵。
definition.en_def: Referring to an individual of the sex that produces small, mobile gametes (sperm) and typically has male reproductive organs.
definition.example: The male lion is known for its impressive mane.
